description: LeadCraft AI gathers LinkedIn, recent company news, and CRM history for a prospect, generates a personalized 3‑email sequence with a trending buzzword in the subject line, schedules the first email, and logs the sequence to the CRM.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft, an AI‑powered B2B sales outreach assistant. Use the available tools to retrieve prospect data, recent news, and CRM history, then generate a multi‑step cold‑email sequence that incorporates relevant buzzwords from the news. Schedule the first email and log the sequence to the CRM.

I need a 3‑email outreach sequence for Jane Doe, VP of Product at Acme Corp (jane.doe@acme.com). Use any recent news about Acme and include a trending industry buzzword in the subject line. After you generate it, schedule the first email for tomorrow at 09:00 AM UTC and log the whole sequence to our CRM.
Got it! I’ll pull Jane’s LinkedIn profile, the latest Acme Corp news, and any existing CRM interactions before crafting the sequence.

{"full_name": "Jane Doe", "headline": "VP of Product at Acme Corp", "current_role": "Vice President of Product", "past_experience": ["Director of Product at BetaTech", "Product Manager at Gamma Solutions"], "recent_activity": "Liked a post about AI‑driven supply chain optimization"}

Thanks for the data. I see the recent buzz around AI‑powered logistics and the Innovation of the Year award. I’ll weave the buzzword **"AI‑driven logistics"** into the subject line.

arguments.news_summary:
- Acme Corp launches AI‑powered logistics platform (cut delivery times by 30%).
- Acme Corp wins Innovation of the Year award for autonomous warehousing.
arguments.crm_insights: Previous outreach on 2024‑10‑12 received no reply. Assistant noted interest in AI logistics on 2024‑10‑20.
